# Your definitions here.
# They will be imported in the module 'user'.

import numpy as np

def mandelbrot(i,j2, speed):
	x = 0*i + 0*j2
	c = (i+1j*j2)
	z = c
	for i in range(60):
		zb = np.multiply(z,z) + c
		z = zb
		x[np.where(np.abs(z)>0.00001)] = speed*np.log(i)
	#x[np.where(np.abs(z)>0.00001)] = 0
	return x
